price: Encomiéndate a Dios, que tú estás en la verdad evidente.
arabic: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innaka ʿalā al-ḥaqi al-mubīni
